Package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace

Interface ChromaticAdaptation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BradfordAdaptation, XYZscalingAdaptation
    public interface ChromaticAdaptation
    Interface specifying a chromatic adaptation transform.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      float[] applyTo​(float[] XYZ1)
      Actual transformation of color coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • applyTo

        float[] applyTo​(float[] XYZ1)
        Actual transformation of color coordinates. XYZ1 are interpreted relative to (source) white point W1. Returns a new color adapted to (target) white point W2.
        Parameters:
        XYZ1 - the original color point w.r.t. W1
        Returns:
        the associated color w.r.t. W2
